Workdone:
Well since we got a nice line on this, we went back to the source files. We tried to see if we can removed HC subs without losing Video, but no luck. So workdone, we had to fix the perspective in the upper right corner and adjust the AR. Since we weren't able to removed HC subs we ended up cropping them off. After that was done, adjust the levels, saturation, and lightly ran a smoother to remove some of the noise. Turn out good.

Audio: Untouched
